comments: She is a very tough teacher, she is rarely available for help, and the class is very test heavy. Be prepared for class the night before because she goes straight into new information that might be hard to understand. If you have the opportunity to switch out, I would recommend to.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  LECTURE HEAVY (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Get ready to read (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  TOUGH GRADER  GET READY TO READ
comments: I had Dr. Bakkegard for BIOL 105 and had to withdraw after the first test. She basically sets you up to fail. Anytime I asked for help she just told me to go to tutoring. Unless you are amazing at biology do not take her. Friends in the same class with a different professor are doing well. Take another professor. Do not recommend at all.

comments: I would not recommend taking this professor. It is a terribly hard class and it requires a lot of you learning the material on your own. There is another professor who teaches this class and I would recommend it over this professor any day. If you do end up having her make sure you read the book along with every detail of the power points.

comments: She is not helpful at all and expects you to know way more than you should coming into the class. This was a Gen Ed class and she treated it (Contemporary Bio)like a class for biology majors. She\'s a nice lady but not a good teacher. Do not take her.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  LECTURE HEAVY (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Get ready to read (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: Dr. Bakkegard is an alright professor. She just reads off the ppt during class, so you basically have to teach yourself. As long as you study the material and review thoroughly, you will be able to do well in the class. She also loves to sing and dance to biology raps from time to time.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  LECTURE HEAVY (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Get ready to read (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I would study for days for the two tests we had this semester, and my grades would not reflect the amount of time I spent preparing. She was helpful in class when we had experiments and labs, but in lecture if we did not understand, she would tell us to go to tutoring.

comments: I hated this class for the entire semester up until the last couple of weeks where we actually went outside to look at nature. Her lectures are boring but tests are straight from powerpoints and books and she lets you use a notecard for each exam and the final. If you don\'t mind work, this class is just ok.

comments: Knows the material very well. Willing to help you. Test are straight from the power points which she gives you. take this class!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  LECTURE HEAVY (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Get ready to read (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: This was the worst class I have ever taken. She is passionate about it and knows it for sure, but her tests are very difficult. I killed myself studying for this class (I should have gotten an A for the amount of work I did) and my reward was a B-. AVOID THIS CLASS AT ALL COSTS.

comments: Really knows her stuff but isn\'t the greatest teacher. Most days are straight lecture. I never studied for anything in her class and got a B.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  LECTURE HEAVY (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Get ready to read (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: worst teacher i have ever had. studied my butt off and the grades i received on tests/assignments did not reflect my level of work. i do not recommend her at all. good luck.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  LECTURE HEAVY (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Get ready to read (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: I had her for Jan Term. I love this stuff so I was interested in it, even though all she did was read off of a power point the whole time (and she gives you them to go along with.) The test are moderate except for the one on insects, that\'s a killer. She is incredibly vague when you ask her a question. It was easy enough. But don\'t expect an easy A

tag_professor: Tough Grader (6)  LECTURE HEAVY (6)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (5)  Get ready to read (2)  TEST HEAVY (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  GRADED BY FEW THINGS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)
comments: All of these comments about her not being willing to help you are from students who don\'t seek help during office hours. Yes, her classes are difficult, but I learned much more than in any other professor\'s upper-level class. Work hard, show up, study, you\'ll do fine.

comments: most unhelpful professor ever. ask her what she wants and all she says is i dont know. then you study your butt of and half of what you studied isnt on the test. she also never encourages you and doesnt really go the extra mile for you. she does love her salamanders, arachnids, and army moves. and she sometimes has funnily awkward slides DONT TAKE!
